channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Provisional rankings Scholarships a.y. 2025/26
item.description: The following provisional rankings for the academic year 2025/2026 are published:%0A‚Ä¢ Regional scholarships%0A‚Ä¢ University scholarships%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Open semester end-of-course exams ‚Äî Request for accommodations and aids for students with disabilities or SLD
item.description: Students with disabilities and/or specific learning disorders (SLD) who are enrolled in the open semester and require special accommodations to take the end-of-course exams have to complete the online request for aids.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 16 + 17 December 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 16 + 17 December 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 17 + 18 December 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 17 + 18 December 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Renewal of the Equal Opportunity Committee (CUG)
New Code of Conduct
item.description: The University has launched a public consultation, open until 1 October 2025 at 14, on the draft of the new Code of Conduct for its staff. The new Code is the result of a process involving both academic and non academic staff, with the aim of laying down clear, up-to-date and collectively endorsed rules on ethics, integrity and transparency.%0A%0Aüîó Learn more on La Statale News

item.title: Open semester: course schedules and attendance
Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
